data.name: Eden Coffee House
data.full_address: Eden Coffee House, 6 Buccleuch St, Melrose TD6 9LD, United Kingdom

reviews.review_text:
Wasn't too sure about this place when I visited.. but the Girl serving us was SOME GIRL. üíØ
Gave great recommendations, great service, great banter and was just all round a treat. Think her name was Chelsea. She was an absolute gem üíé
Would recommend this place just for the quality of service.
reviews.business_response_text: We are glad you enjoyed your visit to Eden! Thank you for your review!

text.en: We are glad you enjoyed your visit to Eden! Thank you for your review!

translations.en:
Wasn't too sure about this place when I visited.. but the Girl serving us was SOME GIRL. üíØ
Gave great recommendations, great service, great banter and was just all round a treat. Think her name was Chelsea. She was an absolute gem üíé
Would recommend this place just for the quality of service.

reviews.review_text: Great bacon rolls! A good place to meet with friends, close to the Abbey and the main car park.  It can be difficult to get a table at peak times. In the summer months there is the option to eat outside.
reviews.business_response_text: Hi David, thank you for your lovely review! We hope to host you and your friends again soon!

review_services.Parking options: Paid parking lot, Free street parking

text.en: Hi David, thank you for your lovely review! We hope to host you and your friends again soon!

translations.en: Great bacon rolls! A good place to meet with friends, close to the Abbey and the main car park.  It can be difficult to get a table at peak times. In the summer months there is the option to eat outside.

reviews.review_text:
Very poor service.
Didn‚Äôt want breakfast or cakes.
Staff deliberately didn‚Äôt tell me if I waited 13 mins to 11:30 i could have the sandwich and soup i tried to order.
Note I would have ordered food and salad to go as the Tour operator said I could.
But sadly the service shut that down too.
So only a cup of tea, instead of 2 meals.
The second staff members attitude was there‚Äôll be more customers so their service attitude didn‚Äôt matter.
2 Shoddy staff and poor service.

translations.en:

reviews.review_text: This is hard review to write, my sister and I went for lunch and coffee which was lovely,  staff where so nice and food was good, we noticed they where having a tapas night thought that‚Äôs  fantastic something different, so we booked in paid a deposit , we were extremely disappointed overpriced and not what we thought , we imagined tapas are loads of little Spanish dishes instead we got over cooked calamari, mushrooms on extremely soggy bread , chips with a smear of Parmesan sprinkled on top, avoid tapas night. But there normal menu is good. There coffee is fantastic.

translations.en: This is hard review to write, my sister and I went for lunch and coffee which was lovely,  staff where so nice and food was good, we noticed they where having a tapas night thought that‚Äôs  fantastic something different, so we booked in paid a deposit , we were extremely disappointed overpriced and not what we thought , we imagined tapas are loads of little Spanish dishes instead we got over cooked calamari, mushrooms on extremely soggy bread , chips with a smear of Parmesan sprinkled on top, avoid tapas night. But there normal menu is good. There coffee is fantastic.

reviews.review_text: We ate breakfast here twice during our recent stay in Melrose and on both occasions were very impressed. The service was super, the staff were very attentive and the food is of the highest quality. The portions are extremely generous. We thoroughly enjoyed our visits here and will definitely return. Thank you üòä

translations.en: We ate breakfast here twice during our recent stay in Melrose and on both occasions were very impressed. The service was super, the staff were very attentive and the food is of the highest quality. The portions are extremely generous. We thoroughly enjoyed our visits here and will definitely return. Thank you üòä

reviews.review_text:
It was ok! Took quite a while to get served. Didn't feel very welcomed when we went in. I ordered eggs Benedict, they were cold and drowned in hollandaise sauce, far too much! Coffee was good but expensive.
I wouldn't rush back

translations.en:
It was ok! Took quite a while to get served. Didn't feel very welcomed when we went in. I ordered eggs Benedict, they were cold and drowned in hollandaise sauce, far too much! Coffee was good but expensive.
I wouldn't rush back

reviews.review_text: Dog friendly, vegan friendly, good service, lovely place for a bite to eat, even the dogs have a small menu

translations.en: Dog friendly, vegan friendly, good service, lovely place for a bite to eat, even the dogs have a small menu

reviews.review_text: Fabulous coffee and cake options.  Recommended

translations.en: Fabulous coffee and cake options.  Recommended

reviews.review_text: Nice location with a few shortfalls. The waitresses were sadly not attentive; we‚Äôd ordered soup and never got it. The food was OK, good toast, great chicken and bacon ciabatta. The poached eggs were boiled and not up to standard. Would I come back? Yes, but I‚Äôd come for cake and coffee.

translations.en: Nice location with a few shortfalls. The waitresses were sadly not attentive; we‚Äôd ordered soup and never got it. The food was OK, good toast, great chicken and bacon ciabatta. The poached eggs were boiled and not up to standard. Would I come back? Yes, but I‚Äôd come for cake and coffee.

reviews.review_text: Lovely visit after wandering around the Abbey. Really lovely coffee, I had the haggis ciabatta which was lovely and my husband had the chilli which he raved about. Great dog friendly cafe, hope to visit again before we go home üòä

translations.en: Lovely visit after wandering around the Abbey. Really lovely coffee, I had the haggis ciabatta which was lovely and my husband had the chilli which he raved about. Great dog friendly cafe, hope to visit again before we go home üòä

reviews.review_text: Stopped with my mum on a dog walk round Melrose. Staff were extremely friendly, and very accommodating of our walking gear. Had a lovely lunch break, will definitely be back on our next trip to Melrose

translations.en: Stopped with my mum on a dog walk round Melrose. Staff were extremely friendly, and very accommodating of our walking gear. Had a lovely lunch break, will definitely be back on our next trip to Melrose

reviews.review_text:
My partner and I visited the cafe on Saturday for brunch. There were plenty of empty tables yet from the door we were told that they're very busy as if we were not welcome.
Eventually we sat down to have lunch al fresco and waited 15min to get menus and another 15min to have order taken. Few tables sat after us, yet their food arrived first (one would assume an avocado toast would take less time to prepare than burger with chips, what a surprise there). Food was nice, service quite bad. I'd give them another chance if some changes are made (staff training?)

translations.en:
My partner and I visited the cafe on Saturday for brunch. There were plenty of empty tables yet from the door we were told that they're very busy as if we were not welcome.
Eventually we sat down to have lunch al fresco and waited 15min to get menus and another 15min to have order taken. Few tables sat after us, yet their food arrived first (one would assume an avocado toast would take less time to prepare than burger with chips, what a surprise there). Food was nice, service quite bad. I'd give them another chance if some changes are made (staff training?)

reviews.review_text: What a lovely cafe . Staff are really pleasant and the lentil soup and rolls are amazing. My husband had a BLT and didn't think he would finish it. All in all good value for money and tasted fantastic. X

translations.en: What a lovely cafe . Staff are really pleasant and the lentil soup and rolls are amazing. My husband had a BLT and didn't think he would finish it. All in all good value for money and tasted fantastic. X

reviews.review_text: A super place to enjoy a welcoming and well cooked lunch. The eggs florentine was cooked beautifully and the wild mushroom ciabatta was delicious. Will definitely be back üòã
reviews.business_response_text: Hi Karen, thank you for your review!  We're glad you enjoyed your lunch at Eden, we hope we can welcome you back soon :)

text.en: Hi Karen, thank you for your review!  We're glad you enjoyed your lunch at Eden, we hope we can welcome you back soon :)

translations.en: A super place to enjoy a welcoming and well cooked lunch. The eggs florentine was cooked beautifully and the wild mushroom ciabatta was delicious. Will definitely be back üòã

reviews.review_text: First time at the Eden. I had the soup/ciabatta combo. Leek and potato soup wasnt the best ive had, thin and over seasoned with pepper, was expecting a more traditional leek n tattie. Ciabatta however was amazing. Haggis, cheese and I left off the sweet chilli sauce ( not needed for haggis), salad with dressing and good quality crisps. Lovely coffee too in cups which was nicer than mugs!  Pal had burger and chips which was well recieved and tasty. Good portion sizes for cost. Service was first class, all very friendly staff and wait for food, although cafe was busy, was perfect. Fair amount of cakes/ scones but we didnt try. Menu is varied with daily specials.  Only real gripe was the level of music, might be an age thing but we felt it was too loud, more so as lots of voices competing against it. We will be heading back again to sample some more tasty food. Prices are really good. Public car park adjacent makes it easy to get too.

translations.en: First time at the Eden. I had the soup/ciabatta combo. Leek and potato soup wasnt the best ive had, thin and over seasoned with pepper, was expecting a more traditional leek n tattie. Ciabatta however was amazing. Haggis, cheese and I left off the sweet chilli sauce ( not needed for haggis), salad with dressing and good quality crisps. Lovely coffee too in cups which was nicer than mugs!  Pal had burger and chips which was well recieved and tasty. Good portion sizes for cost. Service was first class, all very friendly staff and wait for food, although cafe was busy, was perfect. Fair amount of cakes/ scones but we didnt try. Menu is varied with daily specials.  Only real gripe was the level of music, might be an age thing but we felt it was too loud, more so as lots of voices competing against it. We will be heading back again to sample some more tasty food. Prices are really good. Public car park adjacent makes it easy to get too.

reviews.review_text: Went to the cafe at Saturday lunchtime. The waitresses were not very attentive. We waited 15-20mins to be served, and the table next to us didn‚Äôt have their plates cleared until they ordered a coffee quite some time afterwards. When one of the waitresses served my dad his tea, when placing the items down she put the milk pot into the cup, which was unhygienic. Food was lovely though and we didn‚Äôt wait long for it. When we left after paying we didn‚Äôt get any ‚Äúbye‚Äù from what looked like the lady who was in charge, as her outfit was different. She clearly saw us leaving, and despite me saying ‚Äúbye‚Äù, I was ignored.

translations.en: Went to the cafe at Saturday lunchtime. The waitresses were not very attentive. We waited 15-20mins to be served, and the table next to us didn‚Äôt have their plates cleared until they ordered a coffee quite some time afterwards. When one of the waitresses served my dad his tea, when placing the items down she put the milk pot into the cup, which was unhygienic. Food was lovely though and we didn‚Äôt wait long for it. When we left after paying we didn‚Äôt get any ‚Äúbye‚Äù from what looked like the lady who was in charge, as her outfit was different. She clearly saw us leaving, and despite me saying ‚Äúbye‚Äù, I was ignored.

reviews.review_text:
Went for light lunch, staff not very attentive or alert to customers needs.
Coffees very expensive, charged ¬£1 for extra shot and 60p for oat milk making price for Americano ¬£4.90, Oat latte ¬£4.20. Outrageous even in current climate. Staff spent a lot of time in discussion, seemed unaware of customers arriving...when we asked for bill, just told the total, no bill to check. Overall not the best experience.

translations.en:
Went for light lunch, staff not very attentive or alert to customers needs.
Coffees very expensive, charged ¬£1 for extra shot and 60p for oat milk making price for Americano ¬£4.90, Oat latte ¬£4.20. Outrageous even in current climate. Staff spent a lot of time in discussion, seemed unaware of customers arriving...when we asked for bill, just told the total, no bill to check. Overall not the best experience.

reviews.review_text:
We tried the Friday evening menu which was absolutely outstanding!
Exquisite flavours beautifully presented. Wonderfully warm, welcoming service. We will be back!

translations.en:
We tried the Friday evening menu which was absolutely outstanding!
Exquisite flavours beautifully presented. Wonderfully warm, welcoming service. We will be back!

reviews.review_text: Full Eden breakfast and eggs Benedict - delicious. This was a great choice for a Sunday morning, and completely dog friendly too.
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you for your review! We hope you visit us again soon!

text.en: Thank you for your review! We hope you visit us again soon!

translations.en: Full Eden breakfast and eggs Benedict - delicious. This was a great choice for a Sunday morning, and completely dog friendly too.

reviews.review_text:
A nice place to have a cuppa and lunch that's not far from the abbey. The staff were really helpful and friendly.

Well behaved dogs are welcome.
reviews.business_response_text: Hi Steven, thank you for your lovely review! We have passed this feedback on to our grateful staff and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

text.en: Hi Steven, thank you for your lovely review! We have passed this feedback on to our grateful staff and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

translations.en:
A nice place to have a cuppa and lunch that's not far from the abbey. The staff were really helpful and friendly.

Well behaved dogs are welcome.
